sentences.english: Be drunk suddenly and awake sometimes.
Laying underground electricity lines used in cable boxes in to line for the community to Wu.
sentences.chinese: 使用地下埋设线路供电的，以电缆进线兀接箱为界。

sentences.english: Two photons are created in the decay of the neutral pion.
sentences.chinese: 双光子是在中性兀介子衰变中产生的。

sentences.english: Love is the eternal and lasting lighthouse, which watches the storm unswervingly.
sentences.chinese: 爱是亘古的长期的灯塔，它定睛望着风暴却兀不为动。
